#if a palindrome of length N is given, what is the maximal possible number of characters in a
#"double string" that can be obtained by removing and changing the order of symbols in it?
#abba 4
#abab 4
#abbba 5 -> abba -> abab 4
#abccba 6 -> abcabc 6
#abcdcba 7 -> abccba 6
oa=[]
for i in range(input()):
        x=input()
        if x%2==0:
            oa.append(x)
        else:
            oa.append(x-1)

for i in oa: print i
